title: PREMIUMBEAT.COM
overview:
This was our final project of the course, and required the most amount of frames created. Here, we had a voiceover given to us and we needed to make visuals complement it. We could take it in any creative direction we chose. On my image of all my frames, I have listed out what phrases go with which images. We were given Premium Beatâ€™s brand PDF, in which we stuck to their color pallet and font requirements.

*created through School of Motion. For educational purposes only.
deliverables:
• The entire spot must be boarded out and must go along with the script.
  • The spot should end with the PremiumBeat logo and URL (premiumbeat.com)
descriptors:
• Targeting content producers. Editors, Motion Designers, YouTubers, Podcasters, hobbyists...
  • Check out our site and brand guidelines (included) for examples of our brand voice and tone
  • The Art Direction is totally up to you, and the script is provided
metaDescription: Logan Rundquist's School of Motion premiumbeat.com Project
